attributes.action: Consider the potential for a future government to abuse any proposed new legislation before passing it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of any government's intentions when passing an act or creating a system, many have the potential for abuse by some future administration. For example, tracking cars' movements for road pricing, or the DNA database could both be powerful tools for a totalitarian government should the wrong people be elected in future. It is the responsibility of the government to avoid creating such tools.
